answers.answer: I do. I have to check my sugar 4 times a day. Good thing is that I change my diet and I have good sugar levels.   I'm having a boy.
With my first I didnt have it. It was a girl. I have it this time and I am having a boy.
With my first (girl) I had it and with my second (girl) I don't have it... For now. I have to check again in about 9 weeks.

question: With my first and this one I haven't got it their boys with my second I had it a girl so I'm wondering who has and hasn't got it and what sex your having
title: How many of you have gestational diabetes? And what sex you having
